Title: Irradiator
Plot: When the CSI team investigates the brutal murder of a family, they trace the killer to the house next door, which might belong to the "Dr. Jekyll" serial killer.
GuestStars: Jorja Fox, John Pyper-Ferguson, Jack Conley, Maurice Compte, Sierra McCormick, Michael Jace, Jennifer Rhodes, Vincent Duvall, Larry Sullivan, John O'Leary, Brady Smith, Deborah Zoe
